channel.title: development on Priydarshi Singh
channel.description: Recent content in development on Priydarshi Singh

item.title: Online Election Manager
item.description:
A cryptographically secure web portal to manage online elections. The software has been used for the following elections at IIT Kanpur:

  • Students' Senate Office Bearers Elections, 2020
  • Hall 6 (GH) Hall Executive Committee Elections, 2020
  • General Elections, 2021
  • GH1 Hall Executive Committee Elections, 2021
  • Hall 7 Hall Executive Committee Elections, 2021
  • Hall 8 Hall Executive Committee Elections, 2021
  • SBRA Executive Committee Elections, 2021
  • Students' Senate Office Bearers Elections, 2021

item.title: QuizKitty
item.description: A messenger bot that can ask you GK questions, built for the Facebook Messaging Hackathon. You can chat with the bot on Facebook Messenger at m.me/quizkitty

item.title: IITKBucks
item.description: My client for IITBucks - a custom blockchain based cryptocurrency

item.title: Centralized Inventory and Purchasing
item.description: Developed a web app for efficient inventory management across various departments of the NGO Vitraag Vigyaan
